headline: London City Lionesses land Swedish international Julia Roddar
summary: London City Lionesses’ latest addition is Swedish international Julia Roddar from Damallsvenskan champions Hammarby IF. Signing a two-season contract, the 32-year-old brings a wealth of elite-level experience on both sides of the Atlantic and helped […]

headline: Three-way battle in Sports Direct Women’s Premiership
summary: The three-way battle at the top of the Sports Direct Women’s Premiership remains following wins for Glentoran, Cliftonville and Lisburn Rangers. Defending champions Glentoran continue to lead the way following a six-goal demolition of Crusaders […]

headline: China midfielder Shen Mengyu joins London City Lionesses
summary: Shen Mengyu has signed a three-year contract with London City Lionesses following her departure from SWPL champions Celtic. The 22-year-old made the China squad for the 2023 FIFA Women’s World Cup, making the starting line-up […]

headline: Genero Adran Premier champions start season at Wrexham Women
summary: Reigning champions Cardiff City travel to last season’s third-place side Wrexham on the opening day on the Genero Adran Leagues season. Runners-up in back-to-back seasons now, Swansea City are under new management in Jamie Sherwood […]

headline: Manchester United Women sign Sweden international Anna Sandberg
summary: Manchester United have signed Sweden international Anna Sandberg on a contract running until the end of the 2026/27 season, with an option for a further year. The defender joins from BK Hacken, where she had […]

headline: Goalkeeper Shae Yañez signs for Crystal Palace Women
summary: Shae Yañez has joined Crystal Palace from Bristol City, bringing the experience of playing in both the WSL and NWSL. She played for San Diego Wave and Washington Spirit, previously spending three seasons with London […]

headline: Manchester City Women sign Japan international Aoba Fujino
summary: Manchester City have signed 20-year-old Japan international forward Aoba Fujino from Tokyo Verdy Beleza on a three-year deal. Fujino is a two-time winner of the WE League Valuable Player Award during her three seasons with […]

headline: Women’s pre-season friendly fixtures for 3 & 4 August
summary: Among the pre-season fixtures for the first weekend of August is the Julie Chipchase Memorial game at Doncaster Rovers FC. Check clubs’ social media channels for confirmation of friendlies, venues and kick-off times. Saturday 3 […]

headline: Bristol City Women sign experienced defender Harley Bennett
summary: Bristol City have signed 34-year-old defender Harley Bennett from Watford on a one-year-deal, with the option of a further season. Bennett previously spent four years at London City Lionesses, captaining the club in the final […]

headline: Aston Villa Women sign Missy Bo Kearns
summary: Aston Villa have signed England U-23 midfielder Missy Bo Kearns on a three-year deal from Liverpool, for whom she played over 100 games. The 23-year-old made her senior debut for the Reds in 2018 and […]
